Specimen Type: Patient sample for DNA extraction (exact specimen type not specified)
Purpose: To perform full gene sequencing of the UGT1A1 gene and generate accurate, reliable diagnostic results.
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, NanoDrop/Qubit fluorometer, thermocycler, next-generation sequencing platform (e.g., Illumina or Thermo Fisher), and bioinformatics software (BWA, GATK, ANNOVAR)
